description: Orders of cyclotomic polynomials containing a coefficient the absolute value of which is >= 3.
mathematica: S[ n_ ] := For[ j=1; t=0, j<n, j++, t=Cases[ CoefficientList[ Cyclotomic[ j, x ], x ], k_ /; Abs[ k ]>2 ]; If[ Length[ t ]!=0, Print[ j ] ] ]; S[ 2822 ]Select[Range[3000],Max[Abs[CoefficientList[Cyclotomic[#,x],x]]]>2&] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Feb 27 2015 *)
author: Peter T. Wang (peterw(AT)cco.caltech.edu)
extensions: Definition clarified by _Harvey P. Dale_, Feb 27 2015
